comments:
I receive the following exception when attempting to update an existing 3.2 Eclipse install to 3.2.1 using the update manager.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.update.core 4 0 2006-10-03 11:56:46.102
!MESSAGE Error retrieving "org.eclipse.platform.source_3.2.1.r321_v20060921-b_XVA-INSQSyMtx". [Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL: http://update.eclipse.org/updates/3.2/features/org.eclipse.platform.source_3.2.1.r321_v20060921-b_XVA-INSQSyMtx.jar.]
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FatalIOException: Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL: http://update.eclipse.org/updates/3.2/features/org.eclipse.platform.source_3.2.1.r321_v20060921-b_XVA-INSQSyMtx.jar.
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.UpdateManagerUtils.checkConnectionResult(UpdateManagerUtils.java:560)
	at org.eclipse.update.core.ContentReference.getInputSize(ContentReference.java:202)
	at org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureContentProvider.asLocalReference(FeatureContentProvider.java:228)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.core.FeaturePackagedContentProvider.getFeatureEntryArchiveReferences(FeaturePackagedContentProvider.java:157)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.operations.UpdateUtils.downloadFeatureContent(UpdateUtils.java:622)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.download(InstallWizard2.java:428)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2.access$3(InstallWizard2.java:399)
	at org.eclipse.update.internal.ui.wizards.InstallWizard2$3.run(InstallWizard2.java:352)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)




I also have the following error in my log file...

!MESSAGE Digest could not be parsed:Unable to retrieve remote reference "http://download.eclipse.org/updates/3.2/digest.zip". [Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL: http://download.eclipse.org/updates/3.2/digest.zip.]


If I point to a mirror the update succeeds.
I too am still seeing this problem. Is there a workaroun? Is it possible to point mu update manager to a different mirror?
I'm not sure what product and component to log this to.  Changing product to "Community" and component to "Callisto".

traces.message: Server returned HTTP response code: "404 Not Found" for URL: http://update.eclipse.org/updates/3.2/features/org.eclipse.platform.source_3.2.1.r321_v20060921-b_XVA-INSQSyMtx.jar.
